Message.Title: "Aung San Suu Kyi" you hillbilly
Message.Msg: Burma was impressed with our president when he referred to the country as Myanmar, the name imposed by the military dictators. He call Sein Thein "President Thein" another hoof-in-mouth gaffe. He did not know the name of Aung San Suu Kyi, only one of the leading human rights advocates in the world. What a fuxing douchenozzle.
